# Ring Width

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support     |
| ------------------ | ----------- |
| `ring-0`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-1`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-2`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-4`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-8`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `ring-inset`       | 🌐 Web only |
